values.value: PCI-DSS Requirement 7 requires that access to cardholder data be restricted to only those individuals whose job requires such access. Users with "Modify All Data" or "View All Data" permissions may have unauthorized access to cardholder data fields.
PCI-DSS Requirement 7 - Restrict access to cardholder data by business need to know, Requirement 8 - Identify and authenticate access to system components

1. Identify all users with access to cardholder data fields (credit card numbers, CVV, etc.). 2. Verify business justification for each user's access. 3. Create granular permission sets with field-level security restrictions. 4. Enable Shield Platform Encryption for cardholder data fields. 5. Implement data masking for non-production environments. 6. Conduct quarterly access reviews for users with cardholder data access.
